summary: A player home inside Azura\'s Star
descriptionHtml:
Creates a home for the player within Azura\'s Star

Farengar Secret-Fire, court wizard of Dragonsreach, has created a new spell. So, naturally, you\'re going to steal it!

The new spell, called Azuras Binding, conjures the player into Azura\'s Star. With some re-modelling the star is now fit for your home.

Including:
a bed
blacksmith forge
enchanters table
alchemy bench
a chest (safe, non-respawning)

the exit is up the path and leads outside Azura\'s Shrine.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For the sake of Skyrim Lore I recommend that you do the quest for Azura\'s Star first. Wouldn\'t make sense to be able to enter the Star when you dont even have it in your possession  
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE SPELL TOME IS LOCATED ON FARENGARS DESK
author: Haonyth
